history.proof: intros d p c l H. unfold essence_list, essence. destruct l. - simpl. qauto use: Nat.lt_eq_cases, le_n_S, Nat.add_succ_r, Nat.add_0_r, Nat.le_0_l unfold: lt inv: nat. - destruct p. + qauto depth: 4 l: on use: Nat.lt_succ_r, Nat.pred_succ, high_aux_1, Nat.add_lt_mono_r, borne_2 unfold: lt, Init.Nat.mul. + simpl. hauto lq: on drew: off use: Nat.add_le_mono, Nat.add_1_r, Nat.max_r, le_n_S, Nat.max_l, Nat.le_ge_cases, Nat.le_0_l.

ctx: intros d p c l H.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA p : prec_list c : ad H : prec_in_dta d p Unable to unify "S (DTA_taille d + S (DTA_taille d + 0))" with "2".

ctx: intros d p c l H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros d p c l H.
apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad p1, p2 : prec_list c : ad t : term l : term_list H : prec_in_dta d (prec_cons a p1 p2) Unable to unify "S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))" with "S (S (taille_0 p1 + taille_0 p2 + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high t) (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d))))".

ctx: intros d p c l H.
apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).

ctx: intros d p c l H.
apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad p1, p2 : prec_list c : ad t : term l : term_list H : prec_in_dta d (prec_cons a p1 p2) Unable to unify "?M1864 <= ?M1864 + ?M1865" with "S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d)) <= S (DTA_taille d + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high t) (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d)))".

ctx: intros d p c l H.
apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA c : ad t : term l : term_list H : prec_in_dta d prec_empty Unable to unify "S (DTA_taille d + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high t) (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d)))" with "2".

original: intros d p c l H. unfold essence_list, essence. destruct l. - simpl. apply le_n. - destruct p. + simpl. apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))). * apply Nat.le_refl. * apply Nat.mul_le_mono_l. apply Nat.le_add_r. + simpl. apply le_n.
